sentences: Ta oli meeleehitel pärast seda, kuidas ta oma töö kaotas.
Meeleheitel inimene otsib alati head lahendust oma probleemidele.
Naised olid meeleeitil, kui nägid selle ilusat kohtu.
context: The word 'meeleheitel' is an Estonian adjective describing someone who is in a state of desperation or hopelessness. It comes from the root words 'meel' (mind/soul) and 'heitel' which relates to being in a difficult situation, together conveying the meaning of being mentally/emotionally in despair. This word describes people who are at their lowest point emotionally and feel they have no way out of their current situation.
